snippet.title: [E3 2010] - Adrenalin Misfits Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience Konami's first ever Kinect for Xbox 360 title with full body motion controls! Adrenalin Misfits thrusts gamers into 7 unbelievable fantasy worlds with exciting boarding battles in amazing environments. Compete in cross boarding action through freestyle, time and collection challenges against boss characters each with unique abilities. Battle Boss' from around the world growing your abilities and gaining more impressive boards each with their own special features. Win a race, steal that boss' board and do battle to collect all 60. Kinect for Xbox 360 controls mean anyone can play because your body is the controller. The Kinect for Xbox 360 camera reads your body's natural motions converting them into character actions on screen. It's not just a race, it's a battle!

ESRB Rating: E for Everyone (Mild Cartoon Violence)
